progetto.view.gui

Class AbstractStateController

  • java.lang.Object
    • progetto.view.gui.AbstractStateController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ChatPaneController, EndGamePaneController, ExistingGamesPaneController, GamePaneController, OtherPlayersPaneController, RoomsPaneController, SagradaPaneController, SocketRMIChoicePaneController, StartingPaneController

    public abstract class AbstractStateController
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the abstract class that is extended by javafx controllers that are aware of the controller
    Author:
    Federica
